EmailTemplate.name: Order Request Confirmation - We've received your request for an order
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Confirmation, {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}; {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: {!Case.Today_Date__c} Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Honeywell Sales Order: {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c} PO#: {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}
Request for Quote Information Only
Dear Customer,
We have received your request for quote, {!Case.Subject} and are processing it.
Honeywell Sales Order: {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c}
If you placed your request on the Aerospace portal, you can track the status of your request for quote.
VIEW THIS ORDER
We will respond within 2 business days. Thank you for the opportunity to provide a quote for this request.
Visit MyAerospace for 24x7 Quote, Order, and Order Status.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support
CONTACT US
